judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and McBride, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Hess, 17 Pa. D. & C. 2d 390.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frederick Edenharter, with him Ellis Brodstein, for appellants.
Charles E. Weidner, with him William R. Lessig, Jr., and Stevens <& Lee, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sternbergh v. Fehling, Appellant.
Argued May 27, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and McBride, JJ.
Frederick Edenharter, with him Ellis Brodstein, for appellants.
Charles E. Weidner, with him William R. Lessig, Jr., and Stevens <& Lee, for appellee.
June 30, 1959:
